00027 gameManager::gameManager(QWidget *_parent): QGLWidget( new CreateCoreGLContext(QGLFormat::defaultFormat()), _parent )
00028 {
00029     // set this widget to have the initial keyboard focus
00030     setFocus();
00031     // re-size the widget to that of the parent (in this case the GLFrame passed in on construction)
00032     this->resize(_parent->size());
00033     // now we start a timer and assign it to the g_updatetimer_basket variable
00034     m_updateTimer = startTimer(60);
00035     m_redrawTimer = startTimer(120);
00036     // clear the key set
00037     m_keysPressed.clear();
00038     //game play and pause flags
00039     playFlag = false;
00040     pauseFLag = false;
00041     //mouse rotation values set to 0
00042     m_rotate=false;
00043     m_spinXFace=0;
00044     m_spinYFace=0;
00045     m_origX=0;
00046     m_origY=0;
00047 }

00062 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 void gameManager::initializeGL()
00064 {
00065     // Black Background
00066     glClearColor(0, 0, 0, 1.0f);
00067     // enable depth testing for drawing
00068     glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00069     // we need to initialise the NGL lib, under windows and linux we also need to
00070     // initialise GLEW, under windows this needs to be done in the app as well
00071     // as the lib hence the WIN32 define
00072     ngl::NGLInit *Init = ngl::NGLInit::instance();
00073     Init->initGlew();
00074     #ifdef WIN32
00075         glewInit(); // need a local glew init as well as lib one for windows
00076     #endif
00077     // load the shader and set the values
00078     // grab an instance of shader manager
00079     ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00080     // shader - Phong
00081     shader->createShaderProgram("Phong");
00082     // now we are going to create empty shaders for Frag and Vert
00083     shader->attachShader("PhongVertex",ngl::VERTEX);
00084     shader->attachShader("PhongFragment",ngl::FRAGMENT);
00085     // attach the source
00086     shader->loadShaderSource("PhongVertex","others/Phong.vs");
00087     shader->loadShaderSource("PhongFragment","others/Phong.fs");
00088     // compile the shaders
00089     shader->compileShader("PhongVertex");
00090     shader->compileShader("PhongFragment");
00091     // add them to the program
00092     shader->attachShaderToProgram("Phong","PhongVertex");
00093     shader->attachShaderToProgram("Phong","PhongFragment");
00094     // now bind the shader attributes for most NGL primitives we use the following
00095     // layout attribute 0 is the vertex data (x,y,z)
00096     shader->bindAttribute("Phong",0,"inVert");
00097     // attribute 1 is the UV data u,v (if present)
00098     shader->bindAttribute("Phong",1,"inUV");
00099     // attribute 2 are the normals x,y,z
00100     shader->bindAttribute("Phong",2,"inNormal");
00101     // now we have associated this data we can link the shader
00102     shader->linkProgramObject("Phong");
00103     // and make it active ready to load values
00104     (*shader)["Phong"]->use();
00105 
00106     // texture shader
00107     ngl::ShaderLib *shader1=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00108     // we are creating a shader called Texture
00109     shader1->createShaderProgram("Texture");
00110     // now we are going to create empty shaders for Frag and Vert
00111     shader1->attachShader("TextureVertex",ngl::VERTEX);
00112     shader1->attachShader("TextureFragment",ngl::FRAGMENT);
00113     // attach the source
00114     shader1->loadShaderSource("TextureVertex","others/TextureVertex.glsl");
00115     shader1->loadShaderSource("TextureFragment","others/TextureFragment.glsl");
00116     // compile the shaders
00117     shader1->compileShader("TextureVertex");
00118     shader1->compileShader("TextureFragment");
00119     // add them to the program
00120     shader1->attachShaderToProgram("Texture","TextureVertex");
00121     shader1->attachShaderToProgram("Texture","TextureFragment");
00122     // now we have associated this data we can link the shader
00123     shader1->linkProgramObject("Texture");
00124     // (*shader1)["Texture"]->use();
00125 
00126     //CAMERA
00127     ngl::Vec3 from(0,20,-80);
00128     ngl::Vec3 to(0,0,0);
00129     ngl::Vec3 up(0,1,0);
00130     // load the coordinates to camera
00131     m_cam= new ngl::Camera(from,to,up,ngl::PERSPECTIVE);
00132     // set the shape using FOV 45 Aspect Ratio based on Width and Height
00133     // The final two are near and far clipping planes of 0.5 and 10
00134     m_cam->setShape(45,(float)720.0/576.0,0.05,350,ngl::PERSPECTIVE);
00135     shader1->setShaderParam3f("viewerPos",m_cam->getEye().m_x,m_cam->getEye().m_y,m_cam->getEye().m_z);
00136 
00137     //LIGHT -after the camera(to pass the transpose of projection mx to LIGHT, for eye space correction
00138     ngl::Mat4 iv=m_cam->getViewMatrix();
00139     iv.transpose();
00140     m_light = new ngl::Light(ngl::Vec3(50,50,2),ngl::Colour(1,1,1,1),ngl::Colour(1,1,1,1),ngl::DIRECTIONALLIGHT);
00141     m_light->setAttenuation(1,0,0);
00142     m_light->setTransform(iv);
00143     // load these values to the shader as well
00144     m_light->loadToShader("light");
00145 
00146     //GAME CHARACTERS
00147     // create the basket with an initial catch count of zero
00148     catchCount = 0; //no of catches in the basket;
00149     m_Basket = new basket(ngl::Vec3(0,-30,0),&m_gameentity,m_cam);
00150     // falling characters
00151     m_fallingChars = new fallingChars(&m_gameentity,m_cam);
00152     // set the position o falling characters
00153     m_fallingChars->setFallingCharPos();
00154     // game ground
00155     m_gameGround = new gameGround(&m_gameentity,m_cam);
00156     // game world/environment
00157     m_gameWorld = new gameWorld("textures/JungleBackground.png","textures/JungleBackground.png",m_cam);
00158 
00159     //game heads up display text
00160     m_hud = new ngl::Text(QFont("Arial",30));
00161 
00162     // add GAME ENTITY meshes and textures
00163     m_gameentity.addGameEntity("basket","models/fruitBasket.obj","textures/wickerBasket.png");
00164     m_gameentity.addGameEntity("hitbasket","models/gardenBasket.obj","textures/damage.png");
00165     m_gameentity.addGameEntity("FallingChars_fruit","models/fallingFruit.obj","textures/redfruit.png");
00166     m_gameentity.addGameEntity("FallingChars_insect","models/insect.obj","textures/greenOrangeInsect.png");
00167     m_gameentity.addGameEntity("FallingChars_stone","models/stone.obj","textures/rock.png");
00168     m_gameentity.addGameEntity("GameWorld","models/gameGround.obj","textures/ground.png");
00169 }

00183 void gameManager::loadMatricesToShader(ngl::TransformStack &_tx)
00184 {
00185   ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00186   ngl::Mat4 MVP=m_cam->getVPMatrix() * _tx.getCurrAndGlobal().getMatrix();
00187   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MVP",MVP);
00188 
00189 }

00193 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00194 void gameManager::paintGL()
00195 {
00196 
00197   // clear the screen and depth buffer
00198   glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00199   // build our transform stack
00200   ngl::Transformation trans;
00201   //trans.setRotation(m_spinX);
00202   // Rotation based on the mouse position for our global transform
00203   ngl::Mat4 rotX;
00204   ngl::Mat4 rotY;
00205   // create the rotation matrices
00206   rotX.rotateX(m_spinXFace);
00207   rotY.rotateY(m_spinYFace);
00208   // multiply the rotations
00209   ngl::Mat4 final=rotY*rotX;
00210   // add the translations
00211   final.m_m[3][0] = m_modelPos.m_x;
00212   final.m_m[3][1] = m_modelPos.m_y;
00213   final.m_m[3][2] = m_modelPos.m_z;
00214   // set this in the TX stack
00215   trans.setMatrix(final);
00216   m_transformStack.setGlobal(trans);
00217 
00218   //draw the game entities
00219   m_Basket->drawBasket("Texture",m_transformStack,m_cam);
00220   m_fallingChars->draw_FallingChars("Texture",m_cam);
00221   m_gameGround->drawGameGround("Texture",m_transformStack,m_cam);
00222   m_gameWorld->draw("Texture",m_transformStack);
00223 
00224   // check if basket's shield is over. if yes, game over..
00225   if ((m_Basket->getBasketShield()) <= 0)
00226   {
00227        m_hud->setColour(1,1,1);
00228        m_hud->renderText(20,40,QString("Game Over...!!!"));
00229        m_hud = new ngl::Text(QFont("Arial",15));
00230        m_hud->setColour(0.9,0.8,0.7);
00231        m_hud->renderText(20,100,QString("...u shud have avoided the stones"));
00232        playFlag = false;
00233   }
00234   // continue to move the characters if there is no pause or exit.
00235   if((playFlag == true) && (pauseFLag == false))
00236    {
00237     moveFallingChars_gl();
00238     moveBasket_gl();
00239    }
00240 }

00258 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00259 void gameManager::timerEvent(QTimerEvent *_event)
00260 {
00261     // the usual process is to check the event timerID and compare it to
00262     // any timers we have started with startTimer
00263     if (_event->timerId() == m_updateTimer)
00264     {
00265         checkCatch();
00266     }
00267     if (_event->timerId() == m_redrawTimer)
00268     {
00269         updateGL();
00270     }
00271 }
00272 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00273 void gameManager::moveBasket_gl()
00274 {
00275     // first we reset the movement values
00276     float xDirection=0.0;
00277     //float yDirection=0.0;
00278     float zDirection=0.0;
00279 
00280     float rotation=0.0;
00281     foreach(Qt::Key key, m_keysPressed)
00282     {
00283         switch (key)
00284         {
00285             case Qt::Key_Left :  { xDirection =  g_BasketUpdate /*+ m_velo*/; break;}
00286             case Qt::Key_Right : { xDirection = -g_BasketUpdate /*+ m_velo*/; break;}
00287             case Qt::Key_Up :    { zDirection =  g_BasketUpdate; break;}
00288             case Qt::Key_Down :  { zDirection = -g_BasketUpdate; break;}
00289             case Qt::Key_R :     { rotation=1.0; break;}
00290             default : break;
00291         }
00292     }
00293     m_Basket->moveBasket(xDirection,zDirection);
00294     // if the set is non zero size we can update the basket movement
00295     // then tell openGL to re-draw
00296     if(m_keysPressed.size() !=0)
00297     {
00298         m_Basket->moveBasket(xDirection,zDirection);
00299         m_Basket->rotateBasket(rotation);
00300     }
00301 }

00312 void gameManager::processKeyDown(QKeyEvent *_event)
00313 {
00314     // add to our keypress set the values of any keys pressed
00315     m_keysPressed += (Qt::Key)_event->key();
00316 }

00321 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00322 void gameManager::processKeyUp(QKeyEvent *_event)
00323 {
00324     // remove from our key set any keys that have been released
00325     m_keysPressed -= (Qt::Key)_event->key();
00326 }
00327 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00328 bool gameManager::basketFallingCharCollision(
00329                                 ngl::Vec3 _pos1,
00330                                 float _rad1,
00331                                 ngl::Vec3 _pos2,
00332                                 float _rad2
00333                                 )
00334 {
00335     ngl::Vec3 relPos;
00336 
00337     //distance between basket and falling char
00338     GLfloat dist;
00339     GLfloat minDist;
00340     GLfloat len;
00341 
00342     relPos = _pos1 - _pos2;
00343     len = relPos.length();
00344     dist = len*len;
00345     minDist = _rad1 + _rad2;
00346 
00347     //check if there is a catch
00348     if(dist<= (minDist * minDist))
00349     {   return true;    }
00350     else
00351     {   return false;   }
00352 }
00353 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00354 void gameManager::checkCatch()
00355 {
00356 
00357     float basketRad=m_Basket->getBasketRad();
00358     float fallingCharRad = 2.0f;
00359 
00360     int fallingCharNum = m_fallingChars->getNumberOfFallingChars();
00361 
00362     for(int i=0;i<fallingCharNum;++i)
00363     {
00364         ngl::Vec3 basketPos=m_Basket->getBasketPos();
00365         ngl::Vec3 * fallingCharPos = m_fallingChars->getFallingCharPos();
00366 
00367         bool charCatch = basketFallingCharCollision(basketPos,
00368                                                     basketRad,
00369                                                     fallingCharPos[i],
00370                                                     fallingCharRad);
00371         if ((charCatch == true) && (m_fallingChars->collectedFlag[i] == false))
00372         {
00373             // increase the catch count
00374             catchCount++;
00375             // set the collected flag for the falling character to true,
00376             // so that it is not available for collection again
00377             m_fallingChars->collectedFlag[i] = true;
00378             // get the type of collected falling character
00379             int ftype = m_fallingChars->getFallingCharType(i);
00380             m_Basket->updateScore(ftype);
00381             emit updateScore();
00382             if (ftype == 3)
00383             {
00384                 m_Basket->reduceShield();
00385                 emit updateShield();
00386                 m_Basket->m_hit = true;
00387                 m_Basket->drawBasket("Texture",m_transformStack,m_cam);
00388             }
00389             m_Basket->m_hit = false;
00390         }
00391         if(m_fallingChars->collectedFlag[i] == true)
00392         {
00393             float moveside = randmove->randomNumber(2);
00394             ngl::Vec3 newPos = m_Basket->getBasketPos();
00395             newPos.m_x -=moveside;
00396             newPos.m_y +=moveup;
00397             m_fallingChars->FallingChars_arr[i] = newPos;
00398         }
00399     }
00400 }

00423 template<typename MO>
00424 void clampmouse(MO& v, const MO& m, const MO& M)
00425 {
00426     v = std::min(M,std::max(m,v));
00427 }
00428 void gameManager::mouseMoveEvent (
00429                                     QMouseEvent * _event
00430                                  )
00431 {
00432     // note the method buttons() is the button state when event was called
00433     // this is different from button() which is used to check which button was
00434     // pressed when the mousePress/Release event is generated
00435     if(m_rotate && _event->buttons() == Qt::LeftButton)
00436     {
00437       int diffx=_event->x()-m_origX;
00438       int diffy=_event->y()-m_origY;
00439       //m_spinXFace += (float) 0.5f * diffy;
00440       m_spinXFace += (float) 0.5f * diffy;
00441       m_spinYFace += (float) 0.5f * diffx;
00442       clampmouse (m_spinXFace, 5, 25);
00443       m_origX = _event->x();
00444       m_origY = _event->y();
00445       updateGL();
00446     }
00447     // right mouse translate code
00448     else if(m_translate && _event->buttons() == Qt::RightButton)
00449     {
00450       int diffX = (int)(_event->x() - m_origXPos);
00451       int diffY = (int)(_event->y() - m_origYPos);
00452       m_origXPos=_event->x();
00453       m_origYPos=_event->y();
00454       m_modelPos.m_x += INCREMENT * diffX;
00455       m_modelPos.m_y -= INCREMENT * diffY;
00456       updateGL();
00457     }
00458 }
00459 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00460 void gameManager::mousePressEvent (
00461                                     QMouseEvent * _event
00462                                   )
00463 {
00464     // this method is called when the mouse button is pressed in this case we
00465     // store the value where the maouse was clicked (x,y) and set the Rotate flag to true
00466     if(_event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
00467     {
00468       m_origX = _event->x();
00469       m_origY = _event->y();
00470       m_rotate =true;
00471     }
00472     // right mouse translate mode
00473     else if(_event->button() == Qt::RightButton)
00474     {
00475       m_origXPos = _event->x();
00476       m_origYPos = _event->y();
00477       m_translate=true;
00478     }
00479 }
00480 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00481 void gameManager::mouseReleaseEvent (
00482                                         QMouseEvent * _event
00483                                     )
00484 {
00485     // this event is called when the mouse button is released
00486     // we then set Rotate to false
00487     if (_event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
00488     {
00489         m_rotate=false;
00490     }
00491     // right mouse translate mode
00492     if (_event->button() == Qt::RightButton)
00493     {
00494         m_translate=false;
00495     }
00496 }
00497 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00498 void gameManager::wheelEvent(
00499                                 QWheelEvent *_event
00500                             )
00501 {
00502     // check the diff of the wheel position (0 means no change)
00503     if(_event->delta() > 0)
00504     {
00505         m_modelPos.m_z+=ZOOM;
00506     }
00507     else if(_event->delta() <0 )
00508     {
00509         m_modelPos.m_z-=ZOOM;
00510     }
00511     updateGL();
00512 }
